item.title: @elonmusk: Was lucky to get early access to grok imagine API Made my best short film yet! Model was CRAZY fast ...
item.description: Was lucky to get early access to grok imagine API Made my best short film yet! Model was CRAZY fast - like 10x > Sora & Veo - which let me crank this thing out in 2 days. Watch with SOUND ON üîä Shoutout to@forwardeployand@xaiteam - keep a look for their cameos of@jimmybajimmyba@TobyPhln@TheGregYang@Yuhu_ai_@Guodzh@TobyPhlnand of course@elonmuskFollow for the sequel!

item.title: @elonmusk: Tested the new Grok Imagine video editing model. I'm impressed - it's a really fast, easy, and preci...
item.description: Tested the new Grok Imagine video editing model. I'm impressed - it's a really fast, easy, and precise! It does a great job of segmenting what you want to change while leaving the rest of the clip consistent. A few examples, original is on the left and edit on the rightüëá

item.title: @elonmusk: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 bill...
item.description: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 billion images within 30 days surpassing competitors like DALL¬∑E, LeonardoAi, Midjourney or Google Veo.

item.description: Good morning my friends. I want to take a moment to tell you how much I appreciate each one of you. Hope you enjoy my first 10 sec Grok video. üíï#Tuesday_Vibes

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cort...
item.description: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina. The deal brings exclusive Olympics content to X users in Europe and the UK, with brands getting access to in-game clips via X's Amplify offering.

item.title: @elonmusk: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumptio...
item.description: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumption that all or most migrants WILL positively contribute to society. But, this....isn't true.

item.title: @elonmusk: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to r...
item.description: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to receive Elon Musk‚Äôs brain chip. "It's magical," he tells Sky's@t0mclark3, "it's cool to see that when I think about moving my hand something actually happens."
